duties_responsibilities.duty: Provide independent and objective analysis and consulting services to analyze and assess project task activities.
Conduct research in problem areas and perform independent analysis of agency operations to identify problems and make recommendations for improvement.
Generate routine and ad hoc reports and provide overall direction and guidance for personnel performing data analysis task activities.
Generate reports from various systems and provide analytical support for evaluating program efficiencies, gaps, and errors.
Create job aids, document and analyze processes, and maintain and enhance existing tools.
Gather and analyze key performance indicators to develop effective measures and metrics to drive improvements.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor’s degree in Data Analysis, Management Analysis, Business Process Reengineering, Strategic Planning, or related field.
